steps.title: 📚 Set the template
steps.intro:
Pick the Resource template to load the fields your school already uses. It keeps names, creators, and rights consistent across the collection.

Tip: Choose the school standard template first to save time later.

steps.title: 📃 Classify the item
steps.intro: Choose the Resource class (Document, Image, Physical Object, etc.). This helps organize and filter items for students and staff.

steps.title: 📖 Add a clear title
steps.intro:
Use a short, specific title students will recognize (e.g., "School Yearbook 2010" or "STEM Fair Poster").

Tip: Avoid placeholders like "Untitled"â€”titles power search results.

steps.title: 📝 Tell the story
steps.intro:
Describe who made it, when, and why it matters to the school. Keep one idea per paragraph and keep it student-friendly.

Tip: Add a second description field if you want both a short blurb and a longer note.

steps.title: 📷 Add media
steps.intro:
Upload photos, scans, or audio that belong to this item. Each file can later have its own caption and credits.

Tip: Drag multiple files here to add them in one go.

steps.title: ⬆ Upload your file
steps.intro: Browse for the file or drag it onto this button. Use clear filenames like "Yearbook_2010.pdf" to keep things organized.
